name: Scratch 3.0 to 2.0 layout
description:
让scratch 3.0看起来类似scratch2.0
Make scratch 3.0 look like scratch 2.0

仅限布局，不包含色彩
Limited layout, No color change.

他让舞台移到了左手边
It let the player on the left.
additional_info:
因为scratch 3.0于2019/01/02正式启用，并将测试版编辑器网址从beta.scratch.mit.edu移动至正式网站scratch.mit.edu/project/{ProjectID}/editor ，所以此次更新是将原先的适用网址替换成新网址。

Since scratch 3.0 was officially launched in January/02, 2019, and the test editor's web site was moved from beta.scratch.mit.edu to scratch.mit.edu/project/{Project ID}/editor, the update replaces the original applicable web site with a new one.

discussions.name: thanks dude! we needed a way to swap the look back for the 2.0 layout! epic work
